metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3530 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Incomplete blacklist vulnerability in the t3lib_div::quoteJSvalue API function in TYPO3 4.5.x before 4.5.19, 4.6.x before 4.6.12 and 4.7.x before 4.7.4 allows remote attackers to conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks via certain HTML5 JavaScript events.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3530` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

typo3 - 4.5.19+dfsg1-1
typo3-database - 4.5.19+dfsg1-1
typo3-dummy - 4.5.19+dfsg1-1
typo3-src-4.5 - 4.5.19+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: typo3-src package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.19+dfsg1-1').
